department: Departement of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Procurement of OEM approved Inflatable Collar to replace a damaged unit on a SAR FRC.
description: The procurement is to purchase an OEM approved Inflatable Collar to replace the damaged Inflatable Collar unit of a SAR FRC for the Department of Fisheries and Oceans with the added requirement of going through a request for proposal (RFP) for this process. The relevant commercial agreement includes Canadian Free Trade Agreement and Competitive-open bidding procurement method.  Requires Low Price as the preferred selection criteria.  and the contract shall have a start date of 31 October, 2023. Contract made on 29 sep 2015 but never provoked.

full_summary:
# Government of Canada Tender Notice: F6855-230476

## Public Works and Government Services (PWSGS) Tender Announcement

### Reference Number: WS4234097363
### Solicitation Number: WS4234097363
### Publication Date: September 29, 2023
### Tender Closing Date: October 23, 2023, 2:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)

### Tender Details:

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open bidding (Method concurrentielle – Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Price Criteria:** Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)
* **Trade Agreements:** The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (Accord de libre-échange canadien)

### Tender Description:

The Department of Fisheries & Oceans (DFO) requires an Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM)-approved inflatable collar to replace a damaged unit on a SAR FRC. The successful bidder will provide a suitable replacement for the damaged unit, ensuring compliance with OEM specifications.

### Tender Delivery Location:

* St. John’s, Newfoundland and Labrador

### Administrative Contact:

* Jonathan Grant (il-lui / he-him)
* Email: jonathan.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Contact details available upon request.

### Notice URL:

Please visit the following website for more information:

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17587009?extsite=MTc1ODcwMDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Tender Status:

This tender notice has been cancelled, effective October 23, 2023. Please be aware that this tender is no longer open for bidding. 

If you need any help with further rewording or have specific requests, I am more than happy to assist you with your technical writing needs. Please feel free to inquire!
